title: Best of The Herd: 09/20/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/20/2018
description:
Colin thinks that Jon Gruden is having trouble turning his media personality side off and it’s getting him into trouble. He thinks the Browns owner will pressure Hue Jackson into playing Baker Mayfield on Thursday Night Football and explains why. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about Patrick Mahomes early success and why the Patriots’ offense isn't struggling the way people say it is. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
